perturbation.original_text:
During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in this Agreement, Naked shall have an exclusive right and license in the Territory to
use Athlete’s name, nickname, initials, autograph, image, likeness, photographs, biographical details, facsimile signature, voice, videos, electronic
media depictions, any words, symbols or other depictions, as well as any other identifying attributes that would identify Athlete to the public,
including any trade mark(s), copyrights which Wade has, as set forth on Schedule A attached hereto, and all multimedia assets that Wade owns or
has right to use (collectively, the “Wade Image”) solely for the advertising, endorsement, promotion, or sale of the Naked Products (including the
Wade Products) in the Territory as follows:
perturbation.changed_text:
During the Term and subject to the limitations set forth in this Agreement, Naked may, at its discretion, have rights to use Athlete’s name, nickname, initials, autograph, image, likeness, photographs, biographical details, facsimile signature, voice, videos, electronic
media depictions, any words, symbols or other depictions, as well as any other identifying attributes that would identify Athlete to the public,
including any trade mark(s), copyrights which Wade has, as set forth on Schedule A attached hereto, and all multimedia assets that Wade owns or
has right to use (collectively, the “Wade Image”) solely for the advertising, endorsement, promotion, or sale of the Naked Products (including the
Wade Products) in the Territory as follows:
perturbation.explanation: The original text grants Naked an "exclusive right and license" to use the Wade Image. The modification introduces "may, at its discretion" which contradicts the exclusivity and makes the right to use the image optional for Naked, thereby creating uncertainty about the core agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
Wade agrees,  to generously and positively promote Naked Products and Wade Products in any  such Independent Promotions on a mutually
agreed upon basis with reasonable frequency and in a manner consistent with drawing attention to the Wade/Naked relationship and promoting the
Naked Products and Wade Products. Naked, in its sole and absolute discretion, may preview all references and other such materials referring to
Naked in the Independent Promotions prior to the public dissemination of such Independent Promotions. Wade agrees to immediately remove all
such materials in his Independent Promotions that Naked, in its sole and absolute discretion requests be removed. Naked has the right to request
such removals at any time, even if Naked previously approved the Independent Promotions, and Naked agrees that all social media promotions it
requests of Athlete shall comply with all applicable rules and regulations.
perturbation.changed_text:
Wade may, at his discretion, promote Naked Products and Wade Products in any  such Independent Promotions on a mutually
agreed upon basis, and Naked has no rights to preview or request changes of the promotions. Naked, in its sole and absolute discretion, may preview all references and other such materials referring to
Naked in the Independent Promotions prior to the public dissemination of such Independent Promotions. Wade agrees to immediately remove all
such materials in his Independent Promotions that Naked, in its sole and absolute discretion requests be removed. Naked has the right to request
such removals at any time, even if Naked previously approved the Independent Promotions, and Naked agrees that all social media promotions it
requests of Athlete shall comply with all applicable rules and regulations.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states that Wade "agrees, to generously and positively promote" Naked products, implying an obligation. The change inserts "Wade may, at his discretion," contradicting the mandatory nature of the promotion and giving Wade the option not to promote. Also, "Naked has no rights to preview or request changes of the promotions" goes against the original text where "Naked, in its sole and absolute discretion, may preview all references and has the right to request such removals".

perturbation.original_text:
All rights to the use of the names, trademarks, service marks, symbols, logos, domain names, trade secrets, confidential know-how, patents,
copyrights, any pending applications with respect to any of the foregoing, and  any other intellectual property and related proprietary rights,
interests and protections (“Intellectual Property Rights”) in connection with Wade Products will be jointly owned by Wade and Naked.
perturbation.changed_text:
All rights to the use of the names, trademarks, service marks, symbols, logos, domain names, trade secrets, confidential know-how, patents,
copyrights, any pending applications with respect to any of the foregoing, and  any other intellectual property and related proprietary rights,
interests and protections (“Intellectual Property Rights”) in connection with Wade Products will be owned by Naked, unless otherwise specified in writing.
perturbation.explanation: The original states that intellectual property rights for Wade Products will be "jointly owned". The modified text makes it so that Wade relinquishes IP ownership to Naked by default, unless a separate written agreement states otherwise.
